name: ServiceControl
description: Controls the starting and stopping of services during installation and uninstallation.

Id.description: Unique identifier for the service control.

Name.description: The name of the service to control.

Wait.description: Whether to wait for the service to complete the operation.

examples.description: Start on install, stop and remove on uninstall
examples.code: <ServiceControl Id="MyServiceControl" Name="MyAppService" Start="install" Stop="both" Remove="uninstall" Wait="yes" />
